Absolutely amazing!!!With a party of 8, we made a reservation for Monday at 8pm.  Seated right away and offered the fixed price menu.  For 22 euros, the wait staff suggested an assortment of starters which included bruchetta, asparagus, mussels, prawns, potatoes with foie gras (and I may have missed one starter).  Our party was nearly stuffed after just the starters.For the main course, I had the rabbit.  It was very good.  Others in our party had the cod, turbot, calamari, salmon and beef tenderloin.  Universally, the comments from our party were excellent.Add in choice of dessert (sorbet / ice cream / creme brulee) , a glass of sparkling wine to start plus water/wine during the dinner and you have a tremendous value for superbly excellent food.We finished our dinner and departed at 11pm.  By the time we left, the restaurant was full and only one table had turned over.  Clearly what Brandon C had been told was indeed correct, as our party was there for three hours and the restaurant was full on a rainy day/night.The staff was wonderful.  After the meal, we were taking pictures in front of the restaurant and the chef came out front to greet us.  He is from Chicago and if you seem him, be sure to ask to see his picture with a former US president!
